insert.foreach: insert into department_user(`department_id`, `user_id`, `create_time`,`update_time`) values(#{departmentId}, #{userId}, now(), now());

mapper.select: select eu.*, p.sgname as userSgname from department_user eu left join user_profile p on eu.user_id=p.user_id where department_id=#{departmentId} order by id desc

delete.if: delete from department_user where user_id=#{userId} and department_id in (select id from department where enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId})
delete from department_user where department_id=#{departmentId} and user_id=#{userId}
